<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw_ostream</a></>}>
This class implements an extremely fast bulk output stream that can <em>only</em> output to a stream. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw_pwrite_stream</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The buffer is handled in such a way that the buffer is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// uninitialized, unbuffered, or out of space when OutBufCur &gt;=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// OutBufEnd. Thus a single comparison suffices to determine if we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// need to take the slow path to write a single character.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The buffer is in one of three states:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  1 Unbuffered (BufferMode == Unbuffered)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  1 Uninitialized (BufferMode != Unbuffered &amp;&amp; OutBufStart == 0).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  2 Buffered (BufferMode != Unbuffered &amp;&amp; OutBufStart != 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///               OutBufEnd - OutBufStart &gt;= 1).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If buffered, then the raw&#95;ostream owns the buffer if (BufferMode ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// InternalBuffer); otherwise the buffer has been set via SetBuffer and is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// managed by the subclass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If a subclass installs an external buffer using SetBuffer then it can wait</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for a \\see write&#95;impl() call to handle the data which has been put into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this buffer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// tell - Return the current offset with the file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f90ad570f71349466844ee9f2d06cd1"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f90ad570f71349466844ee9f2d06cd1">tell</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> current&#95;pos() + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad6cd89674692383208613b1e4ee560fe">GetNumBytesInBuffer</a>(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If possible, pre-allocate \\p ExtraSize bytes for stream data.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// i.e. it extends internal buffers to keep additional ExtraSize bytes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// So that the stream could keep at least tell() + ExtraSize bytes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// without re-allocations. reserveExtraSpace() does not change</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the size/data of the stream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure we can use the fast path.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)(OutBufEnd - OutBufCur))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;cpp&#95;char8&#95;t)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When using &#96;char8&#95;t &#42;&#96; integers or pointers are written to the ostream</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead of UTF-8 code as one might expect. This might lead to unexpected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// behavior, especially as &#96;u8&quot;&quot;&#96; literals are of type &#96;char8&#95;t&#42;&#96; instead of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// type &#96;char&#95;t&#42;&#96; from C++20 onwards. Thus we disallow using them with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// raw&#95;ostreams.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If you have u8&quot;&quot; literals to stream, you can rewrite them as ordinary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// literals with escape sequences</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// e.g.  replace &#96;u8&quot;\\u00a0&quot;&#96; by &#96;&quot;\\xc2\\xa0&quot;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or use &#96;reinterpret&#95;cast&#96;:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// e.g. replace &#96;u8&quot;\\u00a0&quot;&#96; by &#96;reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;const char &#42;&gt;(u8&quot;\\u00a0&quot;)&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a51b9992ae460e4e0fb0fa7ce054494e8">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char8&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Str) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Inline fast path, particularly for constant strings where a sufficiently</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Changes the foreground color of text that will be output from this point</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// forward.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Color ANSI color to use, the special SAVEDCOLOR can be used to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// change only the bold attribute, and keep colors untouched</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param Bold bold/brighter text, default false</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @param BG if true change the background, default: change foreground</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @returns itself so it can be used within &lt;&lt; invocations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a28fa4a2054d6d628fa4eea21c5262212">changeColor</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a1d5efc43dd5669473ac2fe47d5aaf965">Colors</a> Color, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bold = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BG = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Resets the colors to terminal defaults. Call this when you are done</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// writes the \\p Size bytes starting at</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Ptr to the underlying stream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function is guaranteed to only be called at a point at which it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// safe for the subclass to install a new buffer via SetBuffer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Ptr The start of the data to be written. For buffered streams this</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Size The number of bytes to be written.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Pos = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f90ad570f71349466844ee9f2d06cd1">tell</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// /dev/null always reports a pos of 0, so we cannot perform this check</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in that case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pos)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Tie this stream to the specified stream. Replaces any existing tied-to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// stream. Specifying a nullptr unties the stream. This is intended for to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// tie errs() to outs(), so that outs() is flushed whenever something is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// written to errs(), preventing weird and hard-to-test output when stderr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is redirected to stdout.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a63dfdb79daa6f106196f4acc2748ce43"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a63dfdb79daa6f106196f4acc2748ce43">tie</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &#42;TieTo) &#123; TiedStream = TieTo; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the value of the flag in this raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream indicating whether an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// output error has been encountered.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This doesn&#39;t implicitly flush any pending output.  Also, it doesn&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// guarantee to detect all errors unless the stream has been closed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a0d5a564fb5459ab9ce6e56401786542b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a0d5a564fb5459ab9ce6e56401786542b">has&#95;error</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> bool(EC); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Set the flag read by has&#95;error() to false. If the error flag is set at the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// time when this raw&#95;ostream&#39;s destructor is called, report&#95;fatal&#95;error is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// called to report the error. Use clear&#95;error() after handling the error to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// avoid this behavior.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &quot;Errors should never pass silently.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    Unless explicitly silenced.&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///      - from The Zen of Python, by Tim Peters</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a7b4fefe70f73556669fd513ed9d0fae4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a7b4fefe70f73556669fd513ed9d0fae4">clear&#95;error</a>() &#123; EC = std::error&#95;code(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Locks the underlying file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @returns RAII object that releases the lock upon leaving the scope, if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///          locking was successful. Otherwise returns corresponding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///          error code.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The function blocks the current thread until the lock become available or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// error occurs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Possible use of this function may be as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   if (auto L = stream.lock()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     // ... do action that require file to be locked.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125; else &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     handleAllErrors(std::move(L.takeError()), &#91;&amp;&#93;(ErrorInfoBase &amp;EIB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       // ... handle lock error.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   @endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;sys::fs::FileLocker&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a5a33d325e887c5cfa94e8abac79145b3">lock</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Tries to lock the underlying file within the specified period.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @returns RAII object that releases the lock upon leaving the scope, if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///          locking was successful. Otherwise returns corresponding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///          error code.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It is used as @ref lock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;sys::fs::FileLocker&gt;</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helper struct to add indentation to raw&#95;ostream. Instead of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OS.indent(6) &lt;&lt; &quot;more stuff&quot;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// you can use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OS &lt;&lt; indent(6) &lt;&lt; &quot;more stuff&quot;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which has better ergonomics (and clang-formats better as well).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If indentation is always in increments of a fixed value, you can use Scale</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to set that value once. So indent(1, 2) will add 2 spaces and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// indent(1,2) + 1 will add 4 spaces.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#a7abaab1529c2b7718889fd4400a7f653">indent</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Indentation is represented as &#96;NumIndents&#96; steps of size &#96;Scale&#96; each.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#ac36b2dfaee1e42d0252de93d0437306f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#ac36b2dfaee1e42d0252de93d0437306f">NumIndents</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#a10cfdf15022ce53a72d1363a9d802677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#a10cfdf15022ce53a72d1363a9d802677">Scale</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#a7abaab1529c2b7718889fd4400a7f653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">explicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#a7abaab1529c2b7718889fd4400a7f653">indent</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#ac36b2dfaee1e42d0252de93d0437306f">NumIndents</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent/#a10cfdf15022ce53a72d1363a9d802677">Scale</a> = 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This helper creates an output stream and then passes it to \\p Write.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The stream created is based on the specified \\p OutputFileName:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="comment">/// llvm::outs for &quot;-&quot;, raw&#95;null&#95;ostream for &quot;/dev/null&quot;, and raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for other names. For raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream instances, the stream writes to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a temporary file. The final output file is atomically replaced with the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="comment">/// temporary file after the \\p Write function is finished.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a80a1017cd2662da510365c7ee41a782a">writeToOutput</a>(StringRef OutputFileName,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">                    std::function&lt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a>(raw&#95;ostream &amp;)&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a171c000a87a56f9b4c9b4e3f43c5facfa738b693496ce85aba70051f0aa8722bd">Write</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
